typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		version as float,
		codename as string,
		series as string,
		created as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		release as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		eol as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate({} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		each(match(type == 'string'), concat($$, '_total') = count($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		version as string,
		codename as string,
		series as string,
		created as string,
		release as string,
		eol as string,
		{eol-server} as string,
		{eol-esm} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
